amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit any funding to implement regulations that exempt from the requirements concerning overtime pay under the Fair Labor Standards Act any employee who is not otherwise exempted as of July 11, 2003.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Obey amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 210 - 213 (Roll no. 351).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Obey.
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Obey amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 210 - 213 (Roll no. 351).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
